en.title: Pregnancy Calculator
en.seoTitle: Pregnancy Calculator - Calculate Due Date and Week of Pregnancy
en.metaDescription: Free pregnancy calculator to calculate your due date, how many weeks pregnant you are, and track your pregnancy timeline. Based on last menstrual period or conception date.
longTailKeywords: how many weeks pregnant am i calculator
pregnancy due date by conception date
when is my due date calculator
en.description: Calculate your pregnancy due date and track your weeks of pregnancy. Enter your last menstrual period (LMP) or conception date to get an accurate pregnancy timeline, estimated delivery date, and current week of pregnancy.
en.summary: Calculate due date and pregnancy weeks with LMP or conception date.
instructions: Enter your last menstrual period (LMP) date
See your current pregnancy week and day

seoContent.introduction: Our pregnancy calculator helps you determine your estimated due date and track your weeks of pregnancy. Whether you know your last menstrual period (LMP) or conception date, this calculator provides an accurate pregnancy timeline, helping you plan and prepare for your baby's arrival.
benefits: Calculate accurate due date from LMP or conception date
Track current week and day of pregnancy
Share estimated due date with family and healthcare providers
steps: Select whether you know your LMP or conception date
Enter the first day of your last menstrual period or conception date
View your due date and current pregnancy progress
inputsExplained: Last Menstrual Period (LMP): The first day of your last period before pregnancy
Conception Date: The estimated date of conception
Standard Pregnancy: Calculated as 280 days (40 weeks) from LMP
seoContent.formulaExplanation: Pregnancy due date is typically calculated as 280 days (40 weeks) from the first day of the last menstrual period. This is called Naegele's rule. If you know your conception date, 266 days are added. Most pregnancies last between 266-280 days, with variation being normal.
examples: At 20 weeks: Halfway through pregnancy, anatomy ultrasound typically performed
resultsExplanation: Due Date: Estimated delivery date (±2 weeks variation is normal)
Current Week: Your current week of pregnancy (0-40 weeks)
Current Day: Day within the current week (0-6)
Days Remaining: Days until estimated due date
seoContent.whoItsFor: This pregnancy calculator is essential for pregnant women and couples trying to understand their pregnancy timeline, healthcare providers scheduling prenatal visits, family members and friends wanting to know when baby is expected, and anyone needing to calculate pregnancy dates for medical, personal, or planning purposes.
seoContent.disclaimer: This pregnancy calculator provides an estimated due date based on standard pregnancy calculations. Due dates are estimates only, with most babies born within 2 weeks before or after the calculated date. Ultrasound dating in early pregnancy is the most accurate method. Always consult with your healthcare provider for personalized pregnancy timeline and medical advice. This calculator is for informational purposes only.
relatedTools: Due date calculator for additional calculations
Weeks calculator for other date calculations

faqs.question: How accurate is the pregnancy due date calculator?
faqs.answer: The due date calculated is an estimate based on a standard 280-day pregnancy (40 weeks) from your last menstrual period. Most babies are born within 2 weeks before or after this date. Ultrasound dating in the first trimester is the most accurate method for determining due dates.

faqs.question: What if I don't know my exact LMP date?
faqs.answer: If you don't remember your exact LMP date, use your best estimate or the date of your first ultrasound to get an approximate due date. Your healthcare provider can also help estimate your due date and may adjust it based on ultrasound findings.

faqs.question: Is there a difference between due date and conception date calculations?
faqs.answer: Yes. The standard due date (Naegele's rule) is 280 days from the first day of your LMP. If you know your conception date (not the LMP), add 266 days for the due date. The difference accounts for the time between LMP and actual conception.

faqs.question: Can babies be born before their due date?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. A pregnancy is considered full-term between 37-40 weeks. Babies born between 37-40 weeks are considered full-term. Babies born before 37 weeks are considered premature. Many healthy babies are born before their calculated due date.

es.title: Calculadora de Embarazo
es.seoTitle: Calculadora de Embarazo - Calcular Fecha de Parto y Semanas de Embarazo
es.metaDescription: Calculadora gratuita de embarazo para calcular la fecha de parto estimada y seguir las semanas de embarazo. Basada en el último período menstrual o fecha de concepción.
es.description: Calcule su fecha de parto estimada y siga sus semanas de embarazo. Ingrese su último período menstrual o fecha de concepción.
es.summary: Calcule la fecha de parto y semanas de embarazo con FUM o fecha de concepción.

seoContent.introduction: Nuestra calculadora de embarazo le ayuda a determinar su fecha de parto estimada y seguir sus semanas de embarazo.
benefits: Calcule fecha de parto precisa desde FUM o fecha de concepción
Rastree la semana y día actual del embarazo
steps: Seleccione si conoce su FUM o fecha de concepción
Ingrese el primer día de su último período menstrual o fecha de concepción
Haga clic en calcular para ver resultados
Vea su fecha de parto y progreso del embarazo
seoContent.formulaExplanation: La fecha de parto se calcula típicamente como 280 días (40 semanas) desde el primer día del último período menstrual.

pt.title: Calculadora de Gravidez
pt.seoTitle: Calculadora de Gravidez - Calcular Data de Parto e Semanas de Gravidez
pt.metaDescription: Calculadora gratuita de gravidez para calcular a data estimada de parto e acompanhar as semanas de gravidez. Baseada no último período menstrual ou data de concepção.
pt.description: Calcule sua data estimada de parto e acompanhe suas semanas de gravidez. Digite seu último período menstrual ou data de concepção.
pt.summary: Calcule a data de parto e semanas de gravidez com DUM ou data de concepção.

seoContent.introduction: Nossa calculadora de gravidez ajuda você a determinar sua data estimada de parto e acompanhar suas semanas de gravidez.
benefits: Calcule data de parto precisa a partir de DUM ou data de concepção
Acompanhe a semana e dia atual da gravidez
steps: Selecione se conhece sua DUM ou data de concepção
Digite o primeiro dia do seu último período menstrual ou data de concepção
Clique em calcular para ver os resultados
Veja sua data de parto e progresso da gravidez
seoContent.formulaExplanation: A data de parto é calculada tipicamente como 280 dias (40 semanas) a partir do primeiro dia do último período menstrual.

fr.title: Calculatrice de Grossesse
fr.seoTitle: Calculatrice de Grossesse - Calculer la Date d'Accouchement et les Semaines de Grossesse
fr.metaDescription: Calculatrice gratuite de grossesse pour calculer la date estimée d'accouchement et suivre les semaines de grossesse. Basée sur le dernier jour des règles ou la date de conception.
fr.description: Calculez votre date estimée d'accouchement et suivez vos semaines de grossesse. Entrez votre dernier jour des règles ou votre date de conception.
fr.summary: Calculez la date d'accouchement et les semaines de grossesse avec DDR ou date de conception.

seoContent.introduction: Notre calculatrice de grossesse vous aide à déterminer votre date estimée d'accouchement et à suivre vos semaines de grossesse.
benefits: Calculez la date d'accouchement précise à partir de DDR ou date de conception
Suivez la semaine et le jour actuels de la grossesse
steps: Sélectionnez si vous connaissez votre DDR ou date de conception
Entrez le premier jour de vos dernières règles ou votre date de conception
Cliquez sur calculer pour voir les résultats
Consultez votre date d'accouchement et votre progression de la grossesse
seoContent.formulaExplanation: La date d'accouchement est calculée comme 280 jours (40 semaines) à partir du premier jour du dernier jour des règles.
